name: Gray/flat tab icons (FX)
description: Makes the tab favicons look flat and grayscale using CSS filters.

user.name: tulirebane
user.about: I no longer update my UI styles in this site, please check out my GitLab repo for the newest stuff!

additional_info: Made for Android-style tabs, but can be used with any style or theme. Adjust code as instructed to get the dark version. Tags: b/w black and white black&white gray grayscale tabs tabbar tab icon
